page.title: 12Population Mobility
page.content: Some people who live outside our rectangle come into it to work.The majority of those employed in the rectangle however also live there.The largest influence in our rectangle is the golf course.Some people who play golf come from as far as London and some people come from as near as Launceston itself.Members of the club who live more than twenty five miles away qualify as Country Members and pay a lower subscription.The villages of Langore and Tregadillett have a number of residents who have moved there on retirement.In Tregadillett the proportion of retired persons from London and The Midlands is approximately 40%.During the holiday season thousands of people pass through a small portion of our rectangle.This is along the A30 road between Tregadillett and Launceston.
